result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Memo
Letter from defendant to Judge Dewane requesting signature bond.

Minutes.

records.addlTxt: AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

1:43 p.m.  Defendant in custody.  9/13/22 inducement letter.  Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty plea(s) entered.  Jury calendar.
Offer deadline:  10/14/22, 8:30 a.m.
BAIL MOTION: 
Argument by Atty. N. Heim.  Argument by Atty. Lambrecht.  Court amends bail from $2000 cash to $1000 cash.  All conditions originally ordered remain the same.  Atty. Heim to prepare order.
Further proceedings scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Motion for Bail Modificatoin.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 09-14-22 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.
Preliminary hearing on September 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Nathan Heim, Public Defender.

ADDRESS INFO for Jimmie Lee Baxter Jr
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-01-2022)
Prior: 4573 N 30Th St, Milwaukee, WI 53209
RE:  Felon possess firearm, on 08-26-22.
Prints ordered (MTSO)
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of carry concealed weapon, felon possessing firearm and possess heroin with intent to deliver.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 09-06-22 at 3:00 p.m. Br.3.  Bail is set at $2,000.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety and have no contact with Brandon Patton.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed. Court orders photos and prints at MTSO.
Minutes.
